Package it.polimi.ingsw.ClientView

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Observer
    Interface exposing the methods offered by the client that the server can use
    Translator
    Interface for translator classes that returns names and descriptions of cards in the match
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    This class is for the client CLI.
    EndMatchStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the match is over.
    ErrorStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed in the situation in which the user created a new match but nobody joined it during the waiting countdown.
    ForceEndMatchState
    This view for the CLI is displayed when all the players except you have left the match.
    HasSetDicesStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the player has already set a dice on the scheme card in its turn and he can only pass the turn or use a tool card
    HasUsedAToolcardActionStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the player has already used a tool card in its turn and he can only pass the turn or place a dice on the scheme card
    ItalianTranslator
    Class containing all the italian names and descriptions of the cards in the game and other methods for getting information about players and matches
    MatchNotStartedYetStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the the player created a new match and he has to wait for other players in order to be able to start the match
    MustPassTurnStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the player is in a state where he is obliged to pass the turn
    MustSetDiluentePerPastaSaldanteStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the player used the "Diluente per Pasta Salda" tool card and he has to choose the intensity of the dice.
    MustSetPennelloPerPastaSaldanteStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the player used the "Pennello per Pasta Salda" tool card and he has to place the dice.
    MustSetSchemeCardStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the match is starting and each player has to choose its scheme card
    NotYourTurnStateView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the player have to wait for its turn
    ObserverView
    This class is the main client CLI view responsible for displaying the main men√π and allowing the player to create new matches.
    Printer
    CLI class used to print match elements on screen
    Setter
    This class is responsible for guiding the user in performing the actions inside of a match such as using a tool cards placing dices, passing turns...
    StartTurnView
    This view for the CLI is displayed when the player is starting its turn
